scripts.build: npm run jsonlint && npm run raml2html
scripts.jsonlint: echo 'Linting...'; for INFILE in examples/*.json APIs/schemas/*.json; do jsonlint -q -c $INFILE || exit 1; done
scripts.raml2html: for INFILE in APIs/*.raml ; do echo 'Found RAML file' $INFILE; OUTFILE=${INFILE%%raml}html; raml2html -i $INFILE -o $OUTFILE  || exit 1; echo 'Generated' $OUTFILE; done
